__e: CARLA, I'VE BEEN ALONE FOR A LONG TIME,
Why, if Carla died when she was 17, are there no photos of her over the age of about 12?
I know Carla was like a mother to you.
Well, Carla almost got you killed.
I know Carla dumped a huge loaded shit on you, honey...
Uh, captain, if Carla could use a partner today, I would love to ride along.
Carla said I could tell something to just one person, so here goes.
Carla said something that made me realize what I had to do.
Carla only lets me eat one candy bar every 6 months, so she was helping me choose which one to go with.
As you guys know, my wife Carla cheated on me.
I know you don't care that Henry and I were supposed to go to a very important brunch, but I can't get Carla anymore.
I know this is your wife Carla, and I know you're scared.
- The greatest thing about Carla is I always know I can count on her to be the bad cop.
I don't understand why Carla didn't tell me about you guys.
Because Carla's father was never gonna be her father.
Besides, didn't Carla say you could come see my new place?
